name: bj-spimevw
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Existential introduction, using implicit substitution. This is to ~ spimeh what ~ spimvw is to ~ spimw . (Contributed by BJ, 17-Mar-2020.)
